Far Eastern New Century (FENC; ), formerly known as Far Eastern Textile Limited (FETL; Chinese: 遠東紡織股份有限公司), is a Taiwanese conglomerate. Its main activity is the production and finishing of synthetic fibres and other textiles.[http://wrightreports.ecnext.com/coms2/reportdesc_COMPANY_C760K0080 Far Eastern Textile Ltd. Company Profile - 1402 TAIWAN Market Size, Market Share and Demand Forecast] It has factories in China, Taiwan and Southeast Asia.
In 2007 it was listed in the Forbes Global 2000 largest companies in the world, at #1560.
See also

* Eclat Textile
* Textile industry in Taiwan
